mapper.update:
update damage_repository_device
damage_repository_device.device_code = #{DeviceCode},
damage_repository_device.device_name = #{DeviceName},
damage_repository_device.device_type = #{DeviceType},
damage_repository_device.device_type_code = #{DeviceTypeCode},

damage_repository_device.track_no = #{TrackNo},
damage_repository_device.turnout_no = #{TurnoutNo},
damage_repository_device.user_date = #{UserDate}
damage_repository_device.update_time= current_timestamp
damage_repository_device.order_detail_id = #{orderDetailId}
mapper.select:
select damage_repository_device.create_time, damage_repository_device.device_code, damage_repository_device.device_name, damage_repository_device.device_type, damage_repository_device.device_type_code, damage_repository_device.factory, damage_repository_device.nature, damage_repository_device.order_detail_id, damage_repository_device.radius, damage_repository_device.rail_type, damage_repository_device.seal_number, damage_repository_device.sleeper, damage_repository_device.total_weight, damage_repository_device.track_no, damage_repository_device.turnout_no, damage_repository_device.update_time, damage_repository_device.user_date form damage_repository_device
